title: Why AIC is the only path to certifiable robotics
description:
The EU AI Act could affect humanoids. AIC, or artificial integrated cognition, provides a path for AI to gain the trust needed to advance.

The post Why AIC is the only path to certifiable robotics appeared first on The Robot Report.
